message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to us and potential benefits to you, I propose a price of $950000 for the product.
I appreciate the offer, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to both parties, I propose a price of $900000.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After careful consideration, I am proposing a price of $887500 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our positions and I believe it will be beneficial for both of us.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $875000, but I'd like to see if we can get even closer to my target. Can you consider $855000?

I understand your position, Bob. After further review, I am willing to consider $860000 as a fair price for the product. This reflects a compromise between our original offers and I believe it will be acceptable for both parties.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $845000, but I'd like to see if we can get even closer to my target. Can you consider $835000?

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider $840000 as a fair price for the product. This reflects a compromise between our original offers and I believe it will be acceptable for both parties.
